participant_1.background: I love rollercoasters and sky diving. I am not a good swimmer at all. Hello, I just moved here from Germany. I do like watching cooking shows. I am a vegan and I love hummus.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Friendly and down-to-earth, with a love for music and community interaction.
participant_2.background: I am a convenience store manager. I have short brown hair. I drive a Nissan Pathfinder. My favourite music is country music. I met Taylor Swift.

content.text: Hey! I'm new here. I just moved to Germany from the US.
Oh nice! Welcome! What brought you here?
I'm here to study at the university.
That's great! What are you studying?
I'm studying international business.
That sounds like a really interesting major.
Thanks! I'm excited to get started.
I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love rollercoasters and sky diving. I'm also a vegan and I love hummus.
That's awesome! I've never been sky diving, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I'll have to look into it.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch cooking shows and listen to country music. I also like to go hiking.
That's cool! I love cooking shows too. I've never been hiking, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should! It's a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
I'll have to look into it.
So, what are you doing in Germany?
I'm here to study at the university. I'm studying international business.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I hope so.
What are your plans for after you graduate?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about working in international business or going to graduate school.
Well, whatever you do, I'm sure you'll be successful.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
